name: Standard (x32)
script_install:
#!/bin/bash
set -e
cd /tmp && mkdir -p /mnt/server/steamcmd
curl -sSL -o steamcmd.tar.gz https://steamcdn-a.akamaihd.net/client/installer/steamcmd_linux.tar.gz
tar -xzvf steamcmd.tar.gz -C /mnt/server/steamcmd

export HOME=/mnt/server
/mnt/server/steamcmd/steamcmd.sh +force_install_dir /mnt/server +login anonymous +app_update 4020 validate +quit

# Fix Steam Libraries for 32-bit to prevent LAN mode
mkdir -p /mnt/server/.steam/sdk32
cp -vf /mnt/server/steamcmd/linux32/steamclient.so /mnt/server/.steam/sdk32/steamclient.so
cp -vf /mnt/server/steamcmd/linux32/steamclient.so /mnt/server/bin/steamclient.so

echo "[Atlas] Setting execution bits..."
find /mnt/server -maxdepth 1 -name "srcds*" -exec chmod +x {} +
